definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The paper applies microprocessor technology, designs the controller of return irrigation system of geothermal water.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用单片机技术，设计实现地热水回灌控制器。

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 额外的热能由区域集中暖提供，采用地热加热的水。

sentences.english: The designed descaling apparatus has been applied in geothermal system and good results have been achieved.
sentences.chinese: 所设计的除垢器已用于地热水系统，防垢效果显著。

sentences.english: The geothermal resource is rich in Liaocheng of Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山东省聊城市地热资源丰富。

sentences.english: Iceland has already begun constructing a hydrogen grid using plentiful geothermal energy.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛已经着手建设一座利用丰富地热能源的氢气站。

sentences.english: The region is rich in geothermal water resources, the construction of the trench Shentang Resort.
sentences.chinese: 区内地热水资源十分丰富，兴建了神堂沟渡假村。

sentences.english: In the geothermal system of running water, floor water waste.
sentences.chinese: 导致地热系统跑水，地板泡水报废。

sentences.english: The heat probes with pulse-heating have been applied extensively in marine geothermic study.
sentences.chinese: 脉冲加热法的探针已被广泛应用于海洋地热研究中。

sentences.english: In Iceland, many of the buildings and even swimming pools are heated with geothermal hot water.
sentences.chinese: 在冰岛，许多大楼甚至游泳池都是由地热水供热。

sentences.english: The northwest Guangxi belongs to the rift zone of Dian(Yunnan)-Qian(Guizhou)-Gui(Guangxi) with a high temperature geothermal field.
sentences.chinese: 桂西北地区属滇黔桂裂谷，具高的地热场环境。

sentences.english: The deposit formed in the volcano thermal-spring geothermal environments in Cenozoic.
sentences.chinese: 滇西两河金矿床产于新生代火山温泉地热环境中。

sentences.english: The water temperature originates in geothermy warming rate and the radioactive element decay has the heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 水温来源于地热增温率及放射元素的衰变产生热能。

sentences.english: The floor characteristics of heating radiant are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 通过地热试验，分析了地板采暖的性能特性。

sentences.english: Jackson: Going to a relly special place I know.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊并不知道这里已经变成“地热禁区”。

sentences.english: Iceland uses geothermal engergy quite well.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛利用地热的技术非常先进。

sentences.english: Geothermal power is electricity generated by utilizing naturally occurring geological hea sources.
sentences.chinese: 地热发电是利用天然地质老天源产生的电力。
